features: THE COMPLETE VANITY MIRROR - An all-in-one vanity mirror with lights that simulates soft warm, neutral white, or natural daylight to create the perfect light setting for your daily routine. ORBIT is adaptable as a desk mirror for makeup, hair or mens grooming.

TALL & ELEGANT - Designed to add elegance to it’s environment, its 40cm tall, cable-free and streamlined aluminium structure makes it the ideal tabletop mirror that you can place in your bedroom, bathroom or any room where you complete your daily makeup or grooming routine in.

MULTI-ROTATIONAL MAGNETIC BALL - It's easy to tilt the large 11” light up mirror face to portrait or landscape. Additionally, you can detach the main led mirror from the magnetic ball to hold it in your hand for tricky high or low angles.

7X & 1X MAGNIFICATION - Includes the ‘Mini ORBIT’ 7X magnified mirror add on, that magnetically attaches to the main lighted mirror face for more intricate detailing. Wipe rubber surface clean before use to ensure a strong connection.
3 ORBIT COLOUR CHOICES - Make it personal or a perfect gift for women and men by choosing from the selection of ORBIT colours including Blush Rose, Chalk Grey and Phantom Black.
description: Product Description Multiple Light Modes Multiple Lighting Modes - Say goodbye to getting ready in badly lit rooms. Choose from the ORBIT’s 3 versatile lighting modes to simulate natural daylight, soft warm or neutral white lighting, whilst also adjusting the brightness. Large 11" Mirror Face Large 11” Mirror Face for Hair, Beauty & Grooming Needs. Complete your full face, skincare, and hair routine in the ORBIT's large 11” mirror display. No extra trips to full length or bathroom mirrors needed. 7X Mini Magnified Attachment 7X Mini Magnified Attachment - Enhance precision when doing your eyebrows, skincare, and close touch-ups, with a 7X magnifying mirror that magnetically detaches for easy handling. All Angles Covered Versatile 360˚ Angles - The ORBIT is situated on a multi-rotational magnetic ball so that all angles are possible. Turn, tilt and twist it to your desired angle, portrait, or landscape for maximum versatility to make routines that little bit easier. Cordless & Rechargeable Rechargeable - Have peace of mind that your light won't run out in the middle of your routine. The ORBIT’s 4000mAh battery will keep your ring light glowing for up to 5 hours. Fast USB-C charging ensures you’re ready to go even with a quick charge.
